user.title: San Francisco Water Setup
user.description:
Connect to your SFPUC account to monitor water usage.

**Required:** SFPUC username and password for account access.

**Setup Process:**
‚Ä¢ **Account Credentials** - Login to SFPUC portal
‚Ä¢ **Data Access** - Download historical usage data
‚Ä¢ **Sensor Creation** - Daily water usage sensor in gallons
‚Ä¢ **Update Settings** - Configure refresh interval

**How It Works:**

üîê **SFPUC Login**
‚Ä¢ Secure authentication to SFPUC water portal
‚Ä¢ Access to your account's usage history
‚Ä¢ Automatic session management

üìä **Usage Data**
‚Ä¢ Downloads Excel files with historical data
‚Ä¢ Parses daily water consumption
‚Ä¢ Stores data in Home Assistant database

üíß **Water Sensor**
‚Ä¢ Daily usage in gallons (cumulative)
‚Ä¢ State class: TOTAL_INCREASING
‚Ä¢ Device class: water

**Configuration Tips:**
‚Ä¢ Username is typically your account number or email
‚Ä¢ Password is your SFPUC portal password
‚Ä¢ Update interval: 15-1440 minutes (recommended: 60-240)
‚Ä¢ Data is stored locally in Home Assistant database
